attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever been on
attributes.review: if i could rate this app a -3, i would. the app took 5 hours to download and when it finally downloaded a random song started blaring through my phone. it sounded just like taylor swift with a hint of snoop dog... anyways, that’s besides the point. i finally got the sound to stop and got on the app. it asked me for my address which i proceeded to put in. a package arrived at my house 7 seconds later from a guy on a motorized scooter. he THREW the box at my window, shattering it. i opened the box and what did i find? his foreskin. i’ve never been so disappointed in my life. i went back on my phone to see what was going on with the app and when i opened it, there was a picture of THE donald trump eating my dog. about 2 seconds after i saw the picture the app deleted from my phone completely.

attributes.title: Forever traumatized....
attributes.review: Where do I begin.... it started only as a small addiction. Just something to get me through the day. But after a while I started calling COVID-19 a hoax made by the leftist nazi Democrats. I simply can’t manage to not flaunt my privilege as a rich and SUCCESSFUL christian conservative white man with blue eyes and blond hair. My daughter has begun to look rather... seductive and I’ve been having wet dreams about her ever since I downloaded the app. But that’s besides the point. I saw a black man outside of a neighborhood who actually had the AUDACITY to sell  lemonade. I told my family to hide inside the attic because we felt threatened. The next day I began hallucinating . There were five naked Hillary Clinton’s dancing around me and they were all telling me about their deleted emails. I later went into a coma for two weeks. Definitely do not recommend :(

attributes.title: 0/10 DONT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: This app caused a huge huge virus on my phone. I was trying to walk my pet fish and my phone started heating up. 🥵It got so hot that it turned orange and burned my hand. 🔥It kept playing this horrendous screeching music saying “ China “ and “ make America great again” over and over. I tried deleting the app but it wouldn’t let me. My pet fish then got blinded by the noise and stopped swimming.😱This weird President Mr. Dump ruined my life and killed my pet fish. I am very disappointed and this app is a total flop.👎I say we get rid of it so that nobody else’s pet fish will die. I am truly saddened by what has happened with these unfortunate events and I truly hope they can get rid of this app. The orange Oompa Loompa president  still haunts me to this day. 🟠I hope we can make a change and get a better leader who isn’t a big perv, racist, fat orange soon 😢🤧

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!😡😡
attributes.review: My kids are having terrible nightmares because my kids love their president but soon as we get in the app they get greeted by a a horrific living Cheetos puff. They were horrified. And they trying to get my personal information. This is outrageous . My kids are afraid to go to sleep or even go outside of this horrifying creature. And they are also saying “making America great again” this app is implying America is not a great country and needing help for their people and economy. Wow  now they’re shaming us!! This so insulting for all of us living in the land of the free. THIS WHOLE ENTIRE THING IS COMPLETE RIDICULOUS JOKE!!!! As a citizen in the United States of America I expected better from the president!!! They even spreading fake news. Giving this a 1 stars is major pity. No actually giving it 0 stars is major pity. This apps needs to be taken down immediately!!!

attributes.title: no thank you ❤️ i lost my phone
attributes.review:
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

The bee, of course, flies anyway

because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

Barry! Breakfast is ready!

Ooming!

Hang on a second.

Hello?

- Barry?
- Adam?

- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

Looking sharp.

Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

Sorry. I'm excited.

Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

A perfect report card, all B's.

Very proud.

Ma! I got a thing going here.

- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

Never thought I'd make it.

Three days grade school,
three days high school.

Those were awkward.

Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

You did come back different.

- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

- Hear about Frankie?
- Yeah.

- You going to the funeral?
- No, I'm not going.

Everybody knows,
sting someone, you die.

attributes.title: Now homeless 😔
attributes.review: It was a typical day when I was looking for jokes to tell people so I downloaded this app. 🤪As soon as I did I started to hear howling coming from outside of my house 🏠 when I looked out of the window there were at least 💯 rabid wolves covered in Cheeto dust standing in suits 🕴🏻the howling was so loud that it broke all the glass in my house 💥 it broke the windows and the mirrors and everything 😖 unfortunately the landlord was coming that day and once she saw what had happened to her precious windows she kicked us all out 😢 my fish’s bowl also broke and one of the wolves ate my goldfish 🐠☠️ my family and I now live outside of the White House on the sidewalk and some random man who looks like=🟠🟧🔶🦐🦀🍁🍊🥕🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤 literally steps on us to make himself look taller for pictures with a book 📚  oh no he’s coming out again 😭 bye lovelies 💝💝

attributes.title: Satanic cat
attributes.review: So I got this app to see what is was all about but after only 4 minutes of it being open my cat started acting really weird and next thing I know he’s in the bathroom doing a satanic sacrifice TO MY GRANDMA and I didn’t know how to stop it  when I did he went and hit me with a bat then I passed out I wake up and my cat is in the kitchen eating all of our food and now we have to go hungry because we can’t go out to the store because of corona and then he starts jumping on the wall saying “ahhhhbkaisvv” which idk what that mean so I ran up stairs then 10 minutes later I hear a thump I go down to check it and it’s my grandma floating in the air then she poops down and dies r.i.p grandma and then so does my cat but all I can say is that this app is a disgrace and can cause very weird things around your house so don’t download it 🤮🤮🤮🔫

attributes.title: just plain gross 🤢🤮🤢🤮
attributes.review:
ya know i was scrolling thru the app store tryna find some interesting apps to download because as we all know, we’re in a pandemic. a girls gotta occupy herself somehow amiright? i came across this app and i immediately downloaded it. i just HAD to. while waiting for the app to download, my phone OVER HEATED. (keep in mind i was sitting in my 69°F house). so at this point, i was already iffy about this new app i had just downloaded. when my phone stopped over heating, i finally opened the app, took ONE look and remembered that donald trump is racist, homophobic, a rapist, and just plain GROSS. not to mention, he’s killed hundreds of thousands due to this pandemic that he could’ve controlled in the first place. i do NOT recommend this app to anyone and i do NOT recommend voting for this cheeto again in 2020. BLACK LIVES MATTER ✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
VOTE BLUE NO MATTER WHO 💙💙💙💙

attributes.title: WORST PRESIDENT
attributes.review: not only is he ranked 44th/45th worst president america has ever had, BUT he is now trying to turn america into a communist state and is trying to take over. just because he has gotten his feelings hurt by being played by a bunch of teenagers, he is now trying to take away a social media platform for reasons that make no sense. AND he is trying to take america out of the World Health Organization in the middle of a pandemic, please tell me why this would even interest him to leave??? He is a fascist, racist, homophobic man wanting america to go back to the 1960s which by his definition is “great”. who’s gonna tell him that the 1960s was about segregation, no rights to the black and LGBTQIA+ community as well as women staying home and doing the house chores. how is he calling this time “great”? come to think of it, it was only good for straight white men like himself.

attributes.title: I am grieving
attributes.review:
My family is a very supportive family. They support my believes and they also have their own believes. They believe that 🍊 will win this election and they love it. When they downloaded this app they were hoping to have a more clear understanding of everything that happens in his
brain. The app took one month to download and when my family opened it they were at the kitchen table celebrating Easter dinner. It started to malfunction and was glitching so much and started to emit a horrible sound. The flashing lights were bright enough to give my grandma a seizure! She passed later that night. My grandpa fell into a deep state of depression and then passed the next morning. My mom and dad were so scared that they now hate 🍊 I have always hated him though. Now my parents love me more than anything. And hate 🍊 more than anything
